name: MHTOCSMMConditionSepsis
title: MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Condition Sepsis
description: The MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Condition Sepsis is derived from the MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Condition Profile. This derived profile specifies an individual SMM indicator code by binding to an extension, ValueSet, and CodeSystem. /n There are ten ICD-10 codes specified for Sepsis in this profile: A32.7, A40.x, A41.x, I76, O85, O86.04, R65.20, R65.21, T81.12XA, T81.44XA
